professional_summary: Creative Problem-Solver with expertise in User Experience (UX) Research and Design, combining technical knowledge with a deep understanding of human behavior to create intuitive solutions.

key_responsibilities: Leading the development of blockchain-based digital collectibles.
Conducting comparative research on the blockchain industry.
Developing detailed personas and creating visual identities based on subatomic particles.
Creating near-future scenarios for Global and Fortune 100 companies.
Researching cutting-edge technologies and social trends.
Leading SAP system projects including the first successful Disaster Recovery project.
Conducting semi-structured interviews for user needs assessment.
Managing database administration and designing data warehouses and marts.
Performing needs assessments through focus groups and observations.
Developing applications and managing complex databases.
Conducting needs assessments through focus groups and interviews.
